articles.title: Amazon unveils a new AI voice model, Nova Sonic
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.summary: On Tuesday, Amazon debuted a new generative AI model, Nova Sonic, capable of natively processing voice and generating natural-sounding speech. Nova Sonic is available through Bedrock, Amazon's developer platform for building enterprise AI applications via a new bi-directional streaming API. Amazon claims that Nova Sonic's performance is competitive with frontier voice models from OpenAI and Google on benchmarks measuring speed, speech recognition, and conversational quality. The model is 80% less expensive than OpenAI's GPT-4o and is less prone to speech recognition errors.

articles.title: Simulating Reality: How Advanced Vibration Testing Shapes Product Durability
articles.author: Ellie Gabel
articles.summary: Vibration tests show if a product can withstand regular use in a real-world environment. Vibration testing keeps customers satisfied by helping engineers identify problems early. It also shows that the products they buy are safe and will fulfill their intended purposes. It's also important for ensuring they can withstand mission-critical applications, such as space launches.
